::FZ/Killfest/Greven/EndBringer::

The missiles slams into FZ, sending him flipping backwards. He 
regains stability, seeing that the attackers were getting out of 
range. FZ turns in the direction of the Iron Fist and takes off after 
a last look around the battlefield. He needed to report to Zardus, 
and some data couldn't be downloaded through the link he had with 
Zardus's mind. However, he did send some information to Zardus 
psychicly.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killfest blocks the shots with his hands, the armor getting dented. 
He watches Vehement depart and then picks a new target, firing two 
missiles at Demon Wulf's back. His scanners keep track of the 
Brotherhood to see where they were heading.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Detonating the missile heading for him with one of his own, 
EndBringer spins around as the Brotherhood leaves. He roars, running 
at Flesh Ripper from behind and firing two missiles from each gun at 
him, the missiles locking on to Flesh Ripper's signature and 
following it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Greven jumps back, firing a missile into one of the missiles heading 
for him. He ducks right as the first was about to hit, the missile 
misisng and slamming into the ground. Seeing that that enemy was 
leaving, Greven turns around and fires four energy seeking missiles 
at Dark Claw.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Thanks for reminding me, Yan, but my guys aren't hovering, they're 
all going 
> full speed northeast so they're no where near the blast area of the 
puny 
> weapon :p)
> 
> 
> Unicron/Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark 
Claw/The
> Protectobots/Shockwave:
> 
> 
> 
> Unicron kept flying at top speed as did his warriors, feeling a 
small amount 
> of his energy being drained, though every second it was being 
drained less 
> and less.  He raised an arm, launching another ES-seeking missile 
and stopped 
> firing immediately after that, the ancient robot out of firing 
range, unless 
> the enemies pursued them.
> 
> ---
> 
> Vehement dived down in the air, avoiding the missiles but two shots 
striking 
> him.  One in an undamaged part of his robe that absorbed the blast, 
the other 
> hitting him in a gap of the material, getting past some damaged 
armor and 
> deactivating some circuitry that wasn't vital.
> 
> He looked back, firing off ten rapid optic blasts at Killfest, 
raising an 
> arm, but followed Unicron as he was out of firing range of his 
enemies.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher saw two incoming missiles fired off five rapid optic 
blasts on an 
> intercept course with one of the missiles and ducked under one, not 
knowing 
> it was ES-seeking, and yelled out as it exploded against his back.  
He 
> cursed, raising an arm and launching off two energy-signature 
seeking 
> missiles down at Greven, continuing at maximum speed in pursuit of 
Unicron.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector's back was to EndBringer, but his advanced scanners 
detected four 
> projectiles heading towards him and he stopped, firing off ten 
rapid optic 
> blasts, only intercepting three missiles, the other getting close 
to his 
> knees, the Brotherhood 'bot firing another optic blast, the 
exploding missile 
> only three feet from him and sending a nice amount of shrapnel and 
flames 
> into his abdomen and legs.  As if nothing happened, he raised a 
wrist and 
> launched a single energy-signature seeking missile at EndBringer's 
sternum.
> 
> Turning back around, he blasted off into the air gaining altitude 
and in 
> pursuit of Unicron.
> 
> ---
> 
> Demon Wulf watched the three other Protectobots arrived and the Vok 
warrior 
> growled of irritation.  Raising his sword, he fired off five rapid 
optic 
> blasts at Blades' left knee, taking a page out of Groove's book.
> 
> ---
> 
> Flesh Ripper fired off a single optic blast off at the incoming 
charge, 
> missing and letting out as the explosive went off in between his 
feet and 
> sent him in the air a few feet, crashing down onto his chest.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark Claw armed the two double-barrelled laser cannons on top of 
his current 
> mode, firing bolt from each, two at Hot Spot's sternum and two at 
First Aid's 
> left shoulder.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hot Spot felt two burning beams stab into his sternum, the force 
knocking him 
> flat to his back, a small charred out hole in that area.  He got up 
> painfully, transforming to his blue fire truck mode and driving at 
80 MPH at 
> Dark Claw.
> 
> ---
> 
> Groove got up slowly, taking out his twin cannon, arming freezing 
gases and 
> started a painful jog for Flesh Ripper.
> 
> ---
> 
> Blades rolled to the left, crashing to his shoulder in mid roll and 
then 
> getting back up to his feet, firing off three bolts from his photon 
pistol at 
> Demon Wulf, leaping into the air and transforming into his Apache 
mode, 
> arming his cannons.
> 
> ---
> 
> First Aid felt two blasts burn into his shoulder, sending him into 
a slight 
> spin, the robot falling to a knee.  "Slag it!  This isn't happening 
again." 
> he said, getting up and firing a welding laser beam at Dark Claw.
> 
> ---
> 
> Streetwise slowly pushed himself up, but fell back down to his 
chest.  
> "Shi..." he coughed up some mech-fluid, transforming to his police 
car mode 
> and slowly headed for Demon Wulf, gaining speed quickly.
> 
> ---
> 
> Shockwave landed in biped mode behind First Aid, raising his right 
hand, 
> which held a missile launcher, and fired off a rocket at the back 
of First 
> Aid's pelvis.
